reviewText: Each of the 17 hand and arm locks featured are presented complete with the techniques for the various types of grabs from an opponant. I find this so useful as I made very good mp4 clips for my portable devices. These joint locks should be a core fundamental to all training, they are to mine. Now I'm confident I can practice quick effective defences against being grabbed, Thanks.

I have taken classes from Mr. Handwerker and own two of his other dvd's and have found his training to be excellent. I work as a security officer and have used some of the locks shown in this dvd and highly recommend you get this to expand your skills.
